trans-unit.target: TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_SEQ_00<tab>789th Order Dustman Bo Zu is appalled─outraged, shocked, appalled─by a shameless display of industriousness and ambition.

TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_SEQ_01<tab>With a disapproving scowl, Bo Zu relates the recent exploits of the 596th Order, a once<var 1F /var>hapless band of kobolds who are recently climbing the ranks with a most contemptible work ethic. Seek the assistance of 789th Order Acolyte Ba Go, that you might deprive the self<var 1F /var>righteous lot of the fruits of their labor and teach them the important lesson that hard work never pays.

TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_SEQ_02<tab>The eccentric Ba Go, always eager to be a part of any plot that involves large<var 1F /var>scale death and destruction, furnishes you with a few of his hot<var 1F /var>tempered beauties and some coal to direct them to their targets. In return for his aid, he also demands that you recover at least one of the bomb cores from the resulting rubble after the act of sabotage is done. Head to the 596th's new dig northeast of Camp Overlook and place the coal per the acolyte's instructions.
TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_SEQ_03<tab>You have successfully placed the coal on three small piles of supplies. Leave a wide enough berth, then release Ba Go's beauties to finish the job.

TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_SEQ_04<tab>Ba Go's beauties have performed their task admirably, resulting in a firestorm of destruction of which the mad acolyte would be proud. Search the rubble for one of the bomb cores left over from the explosions.
TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_SEQ_05<tab>You have successfully recovered the bomb core. Return to the 789th Order Dig and deliver it to Ba Go.

TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_SEQ_06<tab>Ba Go is pleased, both with the success of his lovingly crafted creations and your ability to recover the core he sought. Eager to return to his work, the acolyte dismisses you abruptly, asking you to report to Bo Zu.

TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_SEQ_07<tab>Sloth and sluggardy have won the day, and there is much rejoicing from Bo Zu. The 789th must remain wary, however, as one never knows when another rogue kobold order might fall prey to the siren call of gainful effort and exertion. Should such a dark day descend, the dustman would call upon your aid anew...
TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_TODO_00<tab>Speak with 789th Order Acolyte Ba Go.
TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_TODO_01<tab>Set smoldering coals on the 596th Order supplies northeast of Camp Overlook.
TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_TODO_02<tab>Release the smart bombs from a safe location.
TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_TODO_03<tab>Retrieve a bomb core from the embers.
TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_TODO_04<tab>Deliver the core to 789th Order Acolyte Ba Go.
TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_TODO_05<tab>Report to 789th Order Dustman Bo Zu.
TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_BOZU_000_000<tab>Those scoundrels─rogues, knaves, scoundrels! This is unforgivable! No, no, it will not be forgiven!
TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_BOZU_000_001<tab>For so long─yes, so many moons─did they rival us at the bottom of the ranks─the hind, the rear, the bottom. Now, they have risen all the way to 596th!
TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_BOZU_000_002<tab>And do you know how they have done this? Through─<gasp>─<var 1A 02 /var>effort<var 1A 01 /var>! Effort, and honest work! The utter gall─nerve, insolence, gall!

TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_BOZU_000_003<tab>Even now, they dig, dig day and night at a vein that affords ore by the tonze─more ore than 789th sees in a year! This shameless ambition must be stopped! Ba Go will know what to do. Yes, yes, you must seek Ba Go. Ba Go always knows.

TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_BOZU_000_004<tab>Even now, the 596th digs, digs day and night. Their industriousness makes me sick─ill, queasy, sick! But Ba Go will know what to do about this. Ba Go, he always knows.

TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_BAGO_000_010<tab>Bo Zu would make big booms at the 596th Order Dig, send them plummeting down the ranks─diving, plunging, plummeting? Ba Go likes this plan. Yes, yes, likes it much.

TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_BAGO_000_011<tab>And you will help? Ba Go likes you too. Yes, Ba Go likes you so much he will lend you some of his beauties. And you will treat them gently─sweetly, kindly, gently.

TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_BAGO_000_012<tab>Ba Go will also give you smolder stones. Find something you want to go boom, place smolder stones close. Then step back. Yes, yes, stand clear. Release Ba Go's beauties, and savor the smell of chaos─relish, enjoy, savor.
TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_BAGO_000_013<tab>But Ba Go does not help you without a condition. No, no, after beauties go boom, you must enter the flames and come out with one of their cores.
TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_BAGO_000_014<tab>Ba Go needs all the cores he can get to build more beauties, make more things go boom. Yes, yes, make many, many booms! Heahehe! Heaahheahahaha!

TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_BAGO_000_015<tab>Find something you want to go boom, and place smolder stone close. Then step back. Yes, yes, stand clear. Release Ba Go's beauties, and savor the smell of chaos─relish, enjoy, savor.

TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_BAGO_000_016<tab>From the chaos, you will bring back a core for Ba Go. With it, Ba Go will build more beauties, make more things go boom. The more booms, the happier is Ba Go. And you want to keep Ba Go happy. Yes, yesss, you do! Heahehe! Heaahheahahaha!
TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_BAGO_000_020<tab>Ba Go's beauties make beautiful, beautiful booms, yes? And you have present for Ba Go? Yes, yes, you do.
TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_BAGO_000_021<tab>Such a lovely, lovely core. Yes, Ba Go's next batch of beauties will be beautiful indeed, won't they? Yesss, yesss, they will!
TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_BAGO_000_022<tab>You're still here? Go, go, go back to Bo Zu, and leave me to my lovelies─my beauties, my darlings, my lovelies.
TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_BOZU_000_030<tab>The adventurer has done well, well has <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> done. Blasts and bursts were heard all the way from here. Yes, yes, they were heard!
TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_BOZU_000_031<tab>The 596th will learn that hard work is futile─pointless, fruitless, futile. Well will they learn the lesson─yes, the lesson we learned long ago.
TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_BOZU_000_032<tab>Should they ever forget this lesson, you must return to play teacher─mentor, instructor, teacher. This you can do, yes? Yes, yes, Bo Zu can trust you.
TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_POPMESSAGE_000_000<tab>You sense a hostile presence!
TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_POPMESSAGE_000_001<tab>There is a rush of heat from among the embers!
TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_KOBOLD01330_000_040<tab>(-596th Order Scout-)You! Yes, you! What are you doing there!?
TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_KOBOLD01330_000_041<tab>(-596th Order Scout-)We toiled long and hard for those! Labored, troubled, toiled!
TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_KOBOLD01330_000_042<tab>(-596th Order Scout-)Leave those alone! Yes, yes, do not touch! Zo Ga will crush us, smash us, squash us!
TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_BALLOON_000_050<tab>What's this!? What, what, I say!
TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_BALLOON_000_051<tab>Hurrr...urrrgh!
TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_POPMESSAGE_000_002<tab>The enemy is still about!
